name: Aether Kite
description:
Explore a new galaxy, largely suffused by an unidentified, air-like substance termed “aether,” in honor of the early days of scientific study of space. Aether has caused previous methods of propulsion and scientific observation to become unreliable, so our leading researchers have developed a new probe, capable of utilizing electromagnetic charges to glide through the aether. These new probes, the Aether Kites, shall deliver sensors to specially selected planets for further research and surveying!

Guide the deployed Aether Kite to the target planet in each cluster by toggling the  charge between positive and negative charges (Mouse 1), to manage your momentum and direction. 

And try not to crash too many; we’re not made out of money!
